Package userinterface.views.board

Class BoardController<stage>

  • java.lang.Object
    • userinterface.views.board.BoardController<stage>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class BoardController<stage>
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller for the main board view, which is also the main view for the game itself. It handles all the UI-interaction concerning the board.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method is initializes important elements of the board view when entering a game.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        See Also:
        Initializable.initialize(URL, ResourceBundle)

      • setOpponentsVisible

        public void setOpponentsVisible()
        This method sets all the pieces on the board visible

      • updatePlayers

        public void updatePlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> opponents)
        This method updates all the pieces on the board. If a player has leaved, it is alerted and the piece is removed from the view.
        Parameters:
        opponents - A list of the local player's opponents

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece​(int currentPos,
                      int newPos,
                      javafx.scene.image.ImageView img)
        This method moves a piece on the board.
        Parameters:
        currentPos - The piece's current position before moving
        newPos - The piece's new position after moving
        img - The piece's visual image on the board

      • moveMyPiece

        private void moveMyPiece​(int currentPos,
                         int newPos,
                         javafx.scene.image.ImageView img)
        This method is used to move the local player's piece on the board. It also needs to check if the player's new position is a corner field.
        Parameters:
        currentPos - The piece's current position before moving
        newPos - The piece's new position after moving
        img - The piece's visual image on the board

      • diceButtonPressed

        public void diceButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when "throw dice" button is pressed. When called it will move player/piece if allowed, and take appropriate action. Position changes is updated to the database.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "throw dice"-button is pressed

      • hidePiece

        private void hidePiece​(Player player,
                       int currentPos)
        This method is used to hide a player's piece from the board for a special event. It will also move the piece to a random location.
        Parameters:
        player - The local player on the current system
        currentPos - The player's current position on the board

      • endTurnPressed

        public void endTurnPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when "End turn"-button is pressed. It will reset the diceThrown variable to false and end the local player's turn. It will also add to the turn counter.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • rulesButtonPressed

        public void rulesButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when the "Rules"-button is pressed. It will call the method showRules from WindowManager.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "Rules"-button is pressed
        See Also:
        WindowManager.showRules(Event)

      • optionsButtonPressed

        public void optionsButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when the "Options"-button is pressed. It switches the view to the options scene.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "Option"-button is pressed

      • logOutButtonPressed

        public void logOutButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when the "Log Out"-button is pressed. It will remove the player from the game and take the player back to the login screen.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "Log Out"-button is pressed.
        See Also:
        Database.logOut(int, String)

      • startGamePressed

        public void startGamePressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when the "Start Game"-button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        e -
        See Also:
        Database.setStarted(int, boolean)

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition​(Player player)
        This method is used to set the active opponent's position.
        Parameters:
        player - The player is the current active opponent

      • propertyPressed

        public void propertyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        This method handles the event when a certain property is clicked on. It will present a new view with information about the property.
        Parameters:
        e - A mouse event when a property is clicked

      • drawWildcard

        public void drawWildcard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method will present a random wildcard and execute a wildcard event.
        Parameters:
        e - This is the event when the player throws the dice

      • prop

        public static Property[] prop()
        This method creates a list of the local player's properties.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of the local player's properties

      • myPropertiesButtonPressed

        public void myPropertiesButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles the event when the "View my properties"-button is pressed. It will present a new view where the user can navigate through the properties owned.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "View my properties"-button is pressed.

      • next

        public static void next​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e,
                        boolean right)

      • updateLabel

        public void updateLabel​(Property property)
        This method is used to update the money-label of a property when it is bought.
        Parameters:
        property - A property that has been bought

      • setLabels

        private void setLabels()
        This method is used to initialize the money-labels at the beginning of a game.

      • buyProperty

        public static boolean buyProperty​(Property property)
        This method is used to buy a certain property.
        Parameters:
        property - The property that is to be bought
        Returns:
        Returns true if property was bought, and if not false
        See Also:
        Database.buyPropertyDb(int, Property, int, String)

      • payRent

        public void payRent​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is used to make a visiting player pay rent if landing on another player's property.
        Parameters:
        e - The event when a player throws dice

      • updateMoneyLabel

        public void updateMoneyLabel()
        This method is used to update the local player's money-label(label that shows balance).

      • awaitStart

        public void awaitStart​(boolean waiting)
        This method is called when initializing a the game, and restricts critical functionality until game starts.
        Parameters:
        waiting - When true the game is awaiting start, when false the game has started

      • loseCondition

        public static boolean loseCondition()
        This method checks how many turns the local player has been in debt.
        Returns:
        Returns true if in debt for 3 turns, otherwise false

      • checkRent

        public static void checkRent​(Player opponent)
        This method is used to check and alert if another player needs to pay the local player rent
        Parameters:
        opponent - The player landing on a property

      • sendButtonPressed

        public void sendButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method handles when the "Send"-button is pressed. It will send a entered chat-message from the local player to the other players
        Parameters:
        e - The event when "Send"-button is pressed
        See Also:
        Database.setMessage(int, String, String)

      • updateChat

        public void updateChat​(int gameID)
        This method is used to update the chat field in view.
        Parameters:
        gameID - The gameID identifies the game of interest in database
